mapper.sql: a.qrid AS "qrid", a.create_name AS "createName", a.gid AS "gid", a.results_tag AS "resultsTag", a.text1 AS "text1", a.text2 AS "text2", a.text3 AS "text3", a.text4 AS "text4", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT a.qrid AS "qrid", a.gid AS "gid", a.results_tag AS "resultsTag", a.text1 AS "text1", a.text2 AS "text2", a.text3 AS "text3", a.text4 AS "text4"
FROM qx_questions_results a WHERE a.gid = #{gid} and a.del_flag = '0'
SELECT z.zone as "zone", z.zone_content as "zoneContent", z.title as "title" FROM qx_zone AS z, qx_zone_answer AS a WHERE a.gid = #{gid} AND a.zone_type = z.zone_type;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qx_questions_results( qrid, create_name, gid, results_tag, text1, text2, text3, text4, update_time, create_time, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{qrid}, #{createName}, #{gid}, #{resultsTag}, #{text1}, #{text2}, #{text3}, #{text4}, #{updateTime}, #{createTime}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE qx_questions_results SET qrid = #{qrid}, create_name = #{createName}, gid = #{gid}, results_tag = #{resultsTag}, text1 = #{text1}, text2 = #{text2}, text3 = #{text3}, text4 = #{text4}, update_time = #{updateTime}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE qrid = #{qrid}
